changeSet.author: jdiaz
jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `role` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `status` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `foreign` varchar(1) NOT NULL, `tax_correlative` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `dni` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `status_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `username_UNIQUE` (`username`), KEY `fk_user_status_idx` (`status_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_user_status` FOREIGN KEY (`status_id`) REFERENCES `status` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user_roles` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `roles_id` int(11) NOT NULL, KEY `user_roles_user_idx` (`user_id`), KEY `user_roles_roles_idx` (`roles_id`), CONSTRAINT `user_roles_roles_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`roles_id`) REFERENCES `role` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `user_roles_user_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `course` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` varchar(5) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `grade` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `course_enrollment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `course_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `students_amount` int(11) NOT NULL, `year` year(4) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `couse_enrollment_user_idx` (`user_id`), KEY `course_enrollment_course_idx` (`course_id`), CONSTRAINT `course_enrollment_course_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`course_id`) REFERENCES `course` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `couse_enrollment_user_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `course_planning` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `course_enrollment_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `week` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `assistance` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `learning_activities` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `evaluation_activities` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `couse_planning_course_enrollment_idx` (`course_enrollment_id`), CONSTRAINT `couse_enrollment_course_enrollment_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`course_enrollment_id`) REFERENCES `course_enrollment` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `income` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `amount` decimal(19,2) NOT NULL, `amount_text` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `pay_method` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_user_income_idx` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_user_income` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `outcome_category` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` varchar(3) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `outcome` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `amount` decimal(19,2) NOT NULL, `amount_text` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `outcome_category_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_outcome_category_idx` (`outcome_category_id`), KEY `fk_user_outcome_idx` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_outcome_category` FOREIGN KEY (`outcome_category_id`) REFERENCES `outcome_category` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `fk_user_outcome` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE SET NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: jdiaz
